pr_title: Runnables in XIIDM util methods can now throw XmlStreamException

timeline.message:
Runnables in XIIDM util methods can now throw XmlStreamException

Signed-off-by: RALAMBOTIANA MIORA <miora.ralambotiana@rte-france.com>

timeline.bodyText: You should mark this method final to avoid someone to override it?
timeline.author: mathbagu

replies.bodyText: It seems it is not possible to make methods in interfaces final (even with default implementation)
replies.author: miovd
